About Me

Hi, I'm Eric

I studied history at Stephen F. Austin State University. I found that helped me appease my curious personality. I'm the type of guy that will spend all day in the library and be perfectly happy doing so. After college I entered the world of real estate where I was a title examiner for many years. I didn't feel like I was being challenged so I enrolled at THE IRON YARD to begin my carreer in design. I have a passion for responsive clean design.
